post_title: Best buffet in the city centre?

comments.author: JoulSauron
comments.body: What type of buffet? There's Wing's World Cuisine near The Church and Nando's by Mary St.

comments.author: CommunicationIll5583
comments.body: one at the top of stephens green shopping centre?

comments.author: MummysSpecialBoy
comments.body: Any buffet would do me, although I do really like a Chinese. What's the best in your opinion?

comments.author: MummysSpecialBoy
comments.body: Dyk what kind of buffet it is?

comments.author: JoulSauron
comments.body:
I actually don't know any, it's been a long time since I last went to one. I heard good things about Wing's, they have a bit of every cuisine.

Fortune Terrace is a Chinese buffet in O'Connell St.

The Mongolian Barbeque in Temple bar is another classic that does all you can eat, a classic!
